data.name: Islamic_law
data.description: The principles and guidelines for Muslim life, covering areas such as worship, ethics, marriage and family, business, and criminal justice.

data.name: Islamic_art_and_architecture
data.description: The various styles and forms of art and architecture that have developed in the Islamic world, including calligraphy, geometry, pottery, and mosque design.

data.name: Islamic_finance_and_economics
data.description: The principles and practices of financial and economic activities that are consistent with Islamic teachings, such as the prohibition of interest and the promotion of social welfare.

data.name: Islamic_science_and_philosophy
data.description: The contributions of Muslim scholars in the fields of science, medicine, mathematics, astronomy, and philosophy, as well as the relationship between science and religion in Islamic thought.

data.name: Islamic_education
data.description: The methods and institutions of learning in the Islamic tradition, from Quranic schools to universities, and the role of education in shaping Muslim culture and society.
topics: Role of education in Muslim culture and society

data.name: Islamic_spirituality_and_mysticism
data.description: The various practices and teachings that aim to cultivate a closer relationship with Allah and a deeper understanding of the Quran and the Prophetic traditions, as well as the role of Sufism in Islamic history and culture.
topics: Understanding of Quran and Prophetic traditions
Role of Sufism in Islamic history and culture
